forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. East wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 47. East wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
